source.80c34aab:
#handling datetime
df.Air_Date = df.Air_Date.apply(pd.to_datetime)
df['month'] = df.Air_Date.apply(lambda x: x.month)
df['day'] = df.Air_Date.apply(lambda x: x.day)
df['year'] = df.Air_Date.apply(lambda x: x.year)
df.drop(['Air_Date'], 1, inplace = True)

source.eb92eccb:
#plotting ratings/year
def plot_df(df, x, y, title="", xlabel='', ylabel='', dpi=100):
    plt.figure(figsize=(16,5), dpi=dpi)
    plt.plot(x, y, color='tab:red')
    plt.gca().set(title=title, xlabel=xlabel, ylabel=ylabel)
    plt.show()
    
plot_df(df, x = df.year, y = df.Rating,xlabel = "Year", ylabel = "Ratings",
            title ="Year vs Ratings")
source.22fdb213:
#Viewership graph
plot_df(df, x = df.year, y = df.US_Viewers,xlabel = "year", ylabel = "US_Viewers",
            title ="year vs viewers")
